per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=vol=(bass+mid+treb)*0.25;
per_frame_4=vol=vol*vol;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=mtime=mtime+vol*0.01;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=q1=time*0.5;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=gamma=1 + min(vol*0.8,1)*0.7
per_frame_12=
per_pixel_1=zm=1.00;
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=sx=zm;
per_pixel_4=sy=zm;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`//uv = uv_orig;
warp_4=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
warp_5=`    float3 dx = (2*GetBlur1(frac(uv+float2(1,0)*d))-2*GetBlur1(frac(uv-float2(1,0)*d)))*0.5;
warp_6=`    float3 dy = (2*GetBlur1(frac(uv+float2(0,1)*d))-2*GetBlur1(frac(uv-float2(0,1)*d)))*0.5;
warp_7=`    float3 b1 = GetBlur1(uv) - 0;
warp_8=`    d *= -1;
warp_9=`    float d2 = d*4;
warp_10=`    float1 c1 = 0.03;
warp_11=`    float1 c2 = -0.008;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*d - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*d2;
warp_15=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).y;
warp_16=`    ret.y += (2*ret.y - 2*b1.y)*c1 + c2;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`
warp_19=`    my_uv = uv - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*d - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*d2;
warp_20=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).x;
warp_21=`    ret.x += (2*ret.x - 2*b1.x)*c1 + c2;
warp_22=`
warp_23=`
warp_24=`    my_uv = uv - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*d - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*d2;
warp_25=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).z;
warp_26=`    ret.z += (2*ret.z - 2*b1.z)*c1 + c2;
warp_27=`//ret = 0;
warp_28=`
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
comp_4=`    float3 dx = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) )*0.5;
comp_5=`    float3 dy = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) )*0.5;
comp_6=`
comp_7=`float2 uv_x = uv- float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw*4 + float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*32;
comp_8=`ret = lerp(GetBlur2(uv).x,GetBlur3(uv).x,0.6) + (GetPixel(uv_x).x-GetBlur1(uv_x).x)*1;
comp_9=`ret =sqrt(ret);
comp_10=`ret = 1- ret;
comp_11=`ret *= lerp(float3(2,1,0),float3(0.5,1,2),(uv.x+uv.y)*0.5);
comp_12=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(2,1,0),GetBlur2(uv + float2(dx.y,dy.y)*0.1).y*2);
comp_13=`ret = lerp(ret,length(float2(dx.x,dy.x)) + GetPixel(uv).x,GetBlur1(uv).y*1.2);
comp_14=`
comp_15=`}
